messages.subject: Hello!
messages.msgSnippet: I ve been subbed to the digest for a few weeks now and figured it was time to introduce myself. I m Lesley- I have a 4yo (5 in January) son, Logan.   We live
messages.messageBody:
I've been subbed to the digest for a few weeks now and figured it was
time to introduce myself.

I'm Lesley- I have a 4yo (5 in January) son, Logan. We live in
Pennsylvania. I have a teaching certificate for this state, otherwise I
would imagine unschooling would be a bit difficult here (though I've
heard of plenty of folks who do it!). I am finally a SAHM after several
years of working outside the home full time and I'm expecting my second
baby in March. My dh and I have been happily married for over 7 years.

I'll be trying to just lurk for a while because I get and send way too
much email already..and I have lots to do for the holidays! Hi to those
of you I've met elsewhere before- looks like I'm in good company here!

Lesley
